text: The Journal of Modern Literature is a quarterly peer-reviewed literary journal covering studies of literature in any language produced after 1900. It was established in 1977 at Temple University; since 1996, it has been published by Indiana University Press. == Abstracting and indexing == The journal is abstracted and indexed by: * MLA Bibliography * EBSCO databases * ProQuest databases * Humanities Index ==References== == External links == * Category:Literary magazines published in the United States Category:Indiana University Press academic journals Category:Quarterly journals Category:English-language journals Category:Publications established in 1977
title: Journal of Modern Literature
